budget

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • budget.User
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Salesperson

    public abstract class User
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a User as a person that can access to the system. Must be specialized as a Salesperson (in the future also Client). It is created from the data in the database or introduced in a form. The object contains basic information about the person, application access and permissions.
    Author:
    oscar

        Constructor
        Parameters:
        id - The unique ID of the user
        email - The email address
        name - The name
        isEnabled - True if the user is able to sign in the application
        permissions - The list of permissions assigned to the user
